website_summaries.verdict: Wearers had better be ready to give the Coldspark UltraDry a resounding round of applause as the boot offers outstanding heat insulation in its remarkably comfortable walls. They should also be prepared to be completely mesmerized by its superb lightness. With all that said, those who are more likely to go on serious winter hikes may be taken aback with the boot’s reported setbacks. Nevertheless, the Coldspark UltraDry is yet another satisfying Vasque product that outdoor lovers may want to check out.
pros: Numerous sources, which include professional footwear critics, commended the excellence of the Vasque Coldspark UltraDry on the insulation front
A large percentage of users found the boot’s level of comfort spectacular
Reputable shoe reviewers called this gear a steal
Its A-grade waterproofing impressed many wearers
This Vasque winter hiking boot floored gear bloggers with its fantastic lightness
Experts were amazed at the flexibility of the Coldspark UltraDry’s supportive collar
Several owners couldn’t help but admire the greatness of this boot in terms of grip
cons: Some users didn’t like the way the boot’s padded collar bunched up on them, giving them pain around the ankle
A product reviewer mentioned that the Coldspark UltraDry from Vasque was not sturdy enough for use on aggressive terrain
An expert was disappointed with the boot’s toe box for not having enough rigidity to support microspikes properly

customer_reviews.title: It's a Warm, Totally Waterproof, and Durable Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.text: Just a very comfortable, totally waterproof and warm boot that held up miraculously well on a trip to Iceland. We slogged through some pretty wet turf, and feet stayed dry the entire time. My feet are very bony and run cold frequently so it was a concern when I read some of the other reviews. My only slight complaint is that it's a little too high around the ankle and rubbed a bit, but not to the point of discomfort. Very durable boot. Wish I could wear it again, but I live in a warm climate so it will have to wait.
customer_reviews.author: LibraCyn

customer_reviews.title: Love them at first
customer_reviews.text: I am normally 7.5/8. Ordered 8.5 and fits perfectly. It's very comfy, can't wait to wear them this winter. Light weight. Not sure why the laces are so short. Then after wearing it once, there is not enough support, not a sturdy boot, returned it.
customer_reviews.author: C Lai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight winter boot
customer_reviews.text: For reference. I wear U.S.A size 7.5 in heels & sneakers. I wear 8 in North Face Baltoro winter boots, Hunter rain boots, & Merrell hiking boots. Purchased these boots in size 8 to accommodate thick winter socks. Wore in 20 degree weather during Yosemite winter snow camping. Kept feet warm & dry without the bulk. Foot freedom. No break in period. Lightweight. Great traction. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: V & J Soukphaly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn this yet in the cold, however the fit is great and they are very comfortable. They don't look to clunky and they are actually incredibly lightweight when you wear or pack them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Lace cleats not made well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for the snow which I im in once a year for a week while skiing. They made it through last year and were very comfortable and dry. This year on the third day the hole that holds the lace in place popped and there’s no way to replace or fix it. I’ve worn the boots less than ten times so this is not wear and tear. Hopefully amazon will refund or replace for me.
customer_reviews.author: brannan

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot For Winter Activities!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my wife to wear mainly for snow shoeing and some other outdoor winter activities. They are light weight, warm and very comfortable and dry. She is extremely happy with them. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were cuter in person than in the picture. Much too small though. I wear a 7.5/8 and ordered an 8. Too small and the foot bed was uncomfortable for my flat feet. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: K.Ko.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: The boots are stiff and undersized. I returned. Wired mag was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Joybells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction and design.
customer_reviews.text: They are snug and sturdy. I'll add their weather-worthiness when this hot summer is over! They look great and feel very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Forget about buying Sorel boots
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable snow boots. I use these for hiking and biking but also just for every day winter use. Forget about long Sorel boots, this is what you need instead.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are true to size and very comfortable right out of the box. Will definitely recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfy, but sturdy and waterproof. Got the men's version for my 87 year old dad. He loves them too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit snugly with winter socks (woman size 7) nice colors, cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 100% waterproof, I stepped into rain/snow puddles with no problem boots stay dried. Fit too snugly with winter socks (woman size 7) nice colors, lite weight. Cons: I took a 2-mile hike (36 F degrees) trail with no snow and ice, with thick winter socks my toes was frozen within 11mins. After 2-mile walk both my heels got blisters, I am not able to hike in these boots period. If you just running errands then your toes will be fine. Also, the hook at the top of the for shoestring got caught few times while walking caused me to trip and fall. overall a great pair of boot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Solid boots for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Made brownie points with my daughter. These shoes were 2/3 the price that REI charges for the same pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: DenverArmo

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, nice and warm, felt comfortable the first time that I wore them. Can't wait to wear them snowshoeing.
customer_reviews.author: BHudson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, always happy with Vasque products
customer_reviews.text: YES. Great quality, always happy with Vasque products. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. They are both comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.author: jldeen

customer_reviews.title: Soft material! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a robe that doesn’t look like a robe at first glance and this is just that! 3/4 length sleeves, but that’s perfect for me so they don’t have get in the way coming breakfast! Very soft fabric. Great length overall. And the best part is the best waist tie is sewn in as part of the robe so I’ll never loose it. I will have have this robe for many many years! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Porter

customer_reviews.title: but I just can't believe that as the side of the boot (where you see those lines) are a very breathable material like you'd find
customer_reviews.text: I returned these boots. They're advertised as waterproof, but I just can't believe that as the side of the boot (where you see those lines) are a very breathable material like you'd find on running shoes. This would be nice for breathability, but not for keeping water out. Also the tag says it's ideal for "damp conditions." I need a warm boot that I can use in wet conditions. Seemed like it would have been a nice boot. I tried them on and they fit with thicker socks. But again I don't think these would have been good for my rainy bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. A little bit to narrow. Looking nice and stylish. My mom tested on -15 Celsius and feel comfortable when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Join Walk

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Warm, dry and lightweight! I got these for winter fat biking and they have worked our great.
customer_reviews.author: MtnBikeMom

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots, fit well, are warm and work well in the snow and slush.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for winter so I haven't worn them much yet. I like the Vasque brand because they run a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kay P

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. It is raining today and it is expected to rain all day, and these boots have already protected my feet from drive-way to work. These are solid boots, well-made yet stylish. They are not overly clunky or bulky but are rugged and have a very appealing design with a pop of blue color. The soles are flexible but sturdy and the laces and loops are well placed for a hi-top style boot. The boots are also warm inside but not overly fuzzy. So far, these are fantastic-highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: skywatcher

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow in the Toe box
customer_reviews.text: These boots appear to be made very well, have nice cushioning, and look great. They run very narrow in the toe box. I usually wear an 8.5 and I ordered a 9. I do recommend ordering up a size as the length was perfect, but just too narrow overall. I am going to return them and order a men's boot since wide isn't available. I'm 5'2", and weigh 110 lbs., and I have flat thin feet.
customer_reviews.author: monkeybusiness

customer_reviews.title: Great all weather winter boot!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best winter boots I've ever owned! They're completely waterproof and my feet have never gotten cold, even in below 0F temperatures. They aren't high enough for super deep snow, but I still typically wear them almost every day of winter. Also have enough support to snow shoe in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter is Coming
customer_reviews.text: With winter on the way, boots are something that you'll need, especially in Michigan. The boots fit comfortably enough. Can't really test how well it does in snow since there have only been flurries up to now, but if it works as advertised then they should come in handy in the bleak midwinter.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fraser

product_meta.title: Vasque Women's Coldspark UltraDry-W Winter Boot
product_meta.description: The vasque cold spark provides the extra dose of confidence to tackle any winter outdoor adventure. There is 200g 3m thinsulate insulation keeping your feet toasty without looking like you just returned from the yukon. Our proprietary ultra dry protects from the elements while our cold hold dual compound polymer outsoles and multi-directional tread pattern provide the traction to keep pushing when the going gets slick.
feature_bullets: Winter hiking boot with fleece collar, 200g 3M Thinsulate insulation and 1.8mm waterproof PU coated leather and softshell textile upper
ColdHold Dual Density winter sole compound
Gaiter D-Ring at end of eyestay
